actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize a railroad-highway crossing demonstration project in Elko, Nevada.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to enter into arrangements to modify a demonstration project in Elko, Nevada, to include the extension of Silver Street over the existing railroad bed to Mountain City intersection. Directs the City of Elko to submit information requested by the Secretary.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a railroad-highway crossing demonstration project in Elko, Nevada.
